# Skills
```{r}
readr::read_csv2("entries/skills.csv") %>%
  group_by(category) %>%
  summarise(skill = stringr::str_c(skill, collapse=", ")) %>%
  mutate(category = factor(category, levels = c("Programming", "Packages", 
                                                "Tools"))) %>%
  arrange(category) %>%
  detailed_entries(what = skill, with = category)
```
